fields.suspect: He was as tall as the trees!
fields.place: He had dried mud on his boots.
fields.weapon: I am sorry, I did not notice anything.
fields.goodbye: I hope you find the crook soon!

fields.suspect: He was head and shoulders above everyone.
fields.place: He mentioned how he loved horses.
fields.weapon: I did not notice anything out of the ordinary.

fields.suspect: He was as thin as a bacon slice.
fields.place: He said he was around water.
fields.weapon: Everything was ok from my perspective.

fields.suspect: He is as thin as I am.
fields.place: He mentioned that he was warming himself by a fire.
fields.weapon: Everything was alright to me.

fields.suspect: We could see eye to eye.
fields.place: He noticed the sound of neighing.
fields.weapon: I don't know anything about that, sorry.

fields.suspect: You would need at least two of him to make a shadow.
fields.place: "Smoke follows beauty", he kept saying.
fields.weapon: I didn't see anything.

fields.suspect: I have a sore neck after talking to him.
fields.place: He said he sat on a stone there.
fields.weapon: I cannot speak on this.

fields.suspect: His eyebrows could rival a bush.
fields.place: I saw him doing something quite strange there. He had asked me if I had a match, because the light went out.
fields.weapon: I have nothing odd to report about that.

fields.suspect: He was as tall as me.
fields.place: He mentioned something about a group of rocks.
fields.weapon: Everything seemed normal to me.

fields.suspect: The thing that stood out to me was his eyebrows.
fields.place: He was telling me how well the fire was built.
fields.weapon: I did not hear anything about that!

fields.suspect: He had a lot of hair, and it wasn't on top.
fields.place: "The fire was quite blinding!", he said.
fields.weapon: I saw nothing special.

fields.suspect: I would have to stand on myself to get a good look at his face.
fields.place: He was telling me how smooth the rocks were over there.
fields.weapon: I didn't see any weapon.
fields.goodbye: I wish there was more I could do!

fields.suspect: His hair was the color of coal.
fields.place: He did not mention anything about where he had been.
fields.weapon: I cannot help you with that.
fields.goodbye: I hope you find him soon!

fields.suspect: I was surprised to see someone else as thin as me.
fields.place: No information on the place to report.
fields.weapon: I couldn't be sure about any weapon.
fields.goodbye: I hope everything turns out alright!

fields.suspect: I thought I saw some ribs on the man.
fields.place: I could not give you any details about the location.
fields.weapon: I did not hear anything about that.
fields.goodbye: I hope you find who you are looking for!

fields.suspect: He bragged how good he was with a bow and arrow.
fields.place: I cannot remember anything about the place he mentioned.
fields.weapon: I am sorry, I cannot give you a definite answer.

fields.suspect: His hair blended into the night sky like mine.
fields.place: I do not recall anything.
fields.weapon: Nothing comes to mind.
fields.goodbye: If I think of any more information, I will let you know!

fields.suspect: He mentioned he had to get something from his tent.
fields.place: I cannot help you, unfortunately.
fields.weapon: I forget what he mentioned about that.
fields.goodbye: I wish I could have assisted more!

fields.suspect: If I did an eyebrow battle with his, we would be evenly matched.
fields.place: I did not hear anything about that.
fields.weapon: He was carrying around a banging instrument.

fields.suspect: He had a large umbrella over his eyes.
fields.place: I cannot add any extra information on the place.
fields.weapon: He could have used the tool to fasten the table together.

fields.suspect: He was a giant.
fields.place: I cannot add anything new about it.
fields.weapon: I noticed one of my tools went missing right after he visited.

fields.suspect: I looked up to him.
fields.place: He never mentioned any places he visited.
fields.weapon: I saw him get on the train with something with a handle.

fields.suspect: Forehead sweat would never reach his eyes.
fields.place: I cannot comment on this.
fields.weapon: I thought I saw a T shaped item in a bag.

fields.suspect: I wondered how many doorways he ran into.
fields.place: That never came up in our conversation.
fields.weapon: I noticed the head of it sticking out of a bag.

fields.suspect: He would fit in well here.
fields.place: He commented about how well their aim was.
fields.weapon: If he had one, I did not see it.

fields.suspect: I asked him if he was from around here.
fields.place: He mentioned hearing crickets in the night.
fields.weapon: There was nothing I noticed.
fields.goodbye: Have a great rest of your day!

fields.suspect: He could fit through a large crack easily.
fields.place: He said he had helped gather wood for a fire nearby.
fields.weapon: If I knew anything, I would tell you.

fields.suspect: He showed me his war cry.
fields.place: He talked about hearing gunshots
fields.weapon: I found nothing his hands.

fields.suspect: If the wind blew, he would have been swept away.
fields.place: He mentioned a bell he heard.
fields.weapon: I did not find anything suspicious.

fields.suspect: There was not much to him.
fields.place: He mentioned how he loved the smell of coffee.
fields.weapon: I didn't see anything to make me question him.
